channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Back of 405 - 409 Bellegrove Road Eastcote Gardens, 13th February
item.description:
Eastcote Gardens which is part of Oxleys woods have overgrown and are growing over into the neighbouring properties. Would like them cut down please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shooters Hill, Shooters Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing street name sign, 13th February
item.description:
There is no clear indication that Carlyle Avenue ends and Walwyn Avenue starts at Br1 2rd We residents are constantly having to go knocking at doors to find our post and parcels. There was a sign but it has gone missing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walwyn Avenue, Widmore, Greater London

item.title: Dog foul EVERYWHERE on pavement outside school, 13th February
item.description:
The road is constantly inundated with dog foul. On the lead up to the school all of the children get it on their shoes walking to school. Itâ€™s horrific and now being classed as poo town.

item.title: Building waste in dangerous position and condition, 13th February
item.description:
The rubble o/s 57 Arrol Road has been on the pavement and now in the road for 2 days. It is getting larger each day. It is left on the street at night, unlit which is a danger to vehicles. It is also on the pavement and is an obstruction to pedestrians especially the elderly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Arrol Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 13th February
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish Dumped and overflowing, 13th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Elderfield Road, Hackney, London
